summary: Hello, this is my first real delve into the creation kit. I know it\\\'s not much but it\\\'s my first mod for any game.
descriptionHtml:
What you get
   + A follower named Brock who is waiting just inside the Bannered Mare
   + He\\\'s strong and ready to go so just ask him to follow

Installation: it\\\'s an ESP file so it goes in your data folder and gets activated in the launcher.
   If you don\\\'t know where your data folder is, if you baught the game from steam, it will be here

c:\\\\program files (x86)\\\\steam\\\\steamapps\\\\common\\\\skyrim\\\\data

Thanks all and any who decide to give this a try.
author: Brandon Cross
